entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as huge and able to part the crowd easily. He is also trusted by Harry despite his unbelievable stories.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who trusts Hagrid despite his unbelievable stories.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as people who have no sense of humour and might be behind a huge joke.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is described as a famous place and a tiny, grubby-looking pub.

relationships.description: Hagrid points out the Leaky Cauldron to Harry.
